.. _`design_system_components_relationshipgroup`:

RelationshipGroup
=================

.. figure:: images/component_relationshipgroup.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Displays an accordion of multiple components of the type :ref:`design_system_components_relationshiptable`.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.objectwidgets.RelationshipGroup.__default__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_relationshiptable`
